channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report X-2023081760
item.description:
Report X-2023081760

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-03T00:35:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-19
  • City: GALLUP
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The shipment was discovered leaking during offload of the vehicle. The package contained 5 glass bottles marked with "Sample" and "Tank 19TGP" "Tank 15TGP" "Tank 6TDP" "Tank 4TDP" "Tank 15TGP". Three of the five bottles were broken. The shipper confirmed that the contents were undeclared fuel samples. The shipment was placed in a salvage drum and held for FAA investigation.
